title-group.article-title: Lessons from the MORS Workshop on Advancing Campaign Analytics
title-group.subtitle: Challenges in Modeling Cyber Warfare, Artificial Intelligence, and Command and Control

caption.p: Determining appropriate campaign modeling metrics for decision-centric approaches to warfare will be challenging.
